base: a suit of lacquered crimson plate
her cloak of flayed humanoid hides
rich red velvet over ancient armour of rusted scales
a living fire elemental, enslaved & streaming from her body
bulky furs, encrusted with gore
the stitched-together ghosts of her conquered foes
only the thick, multicoloured ice that encrusts her body
a white silk robe, matching hood & a veil of diamond beads
her gown of bubbling storm clouds
a dress of sculpted, overlapping hands of mirrored glass
a frozen water elemental, its screaming face forming an exquisite mask
a fantastically elaborate wedding dress
a robe of flowing autumn leaves
thick armour of elaborately carved wooden plates
living fungal armor, a swollen mushroom-like bulb forming the helmet
garlands of fresh flowers & a crude, wooden, many-faced mask
interlaced vines that extend out from inside her throat
a swarm of writhing venomous snakes
a long coat of kaleidoscopic reptile scales
a rocky golem suit, richly inlaid, with multiple arms
her rattling robe of crisscrossed claws & fangs, edge facing outwards
a toxic air elemental lashed around her body in a whirlwind
a turquoise leather jerkin & war paint of white ash
flowing indigo robes over a breastplate & mail forged from meteoric iron
a mourning dress studded with diverse living eyes
billowing silk veils continually spun & re-spun by clusters of huge spiders perched on each shoulder
fool's motley sculpted of murky, half-melted, acidic wax
knightly armor of blackened steel (the gorget massively oversized) decorated with scenes of suffering
a suit of oily yellow bones & a skull helmet, tied up with black lace
her cape of stinging flies
armor of slick dark insect carapaces, leaking molten gold at the joints
an extravagantly ornate nun-like habit of cloth of gold
shackles & chains made of coins from all nations
a solar half-mask & a star-studded astronomical robe
a dress & shawl of minute, clustered gemstones
her sweeping cloak, marked with hundreds of metallic sigils - each binding a separate demon
